name: eSwim
description:
Competitive e-Swimming

1. Find friends (or enemies) to play with.

2. Smoosh your keyboard in a breaststroke motion.

3. Get a replacement keyboard if necessary.

Protip: don't try to hit individual keys. commit to the motion. also, try to avoid system keys, they're out of my reach and can break your pc

click 'client' to join. right click to reset

enjoy
